dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, you know, Jeff Bezos has been, uh, making some pretty significant financial moves lately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you know, Jeff Bezos has been, uh, making some pretty significant financial moves lately.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? What's he up to now? More rocket ships to the moon, like?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? What's he up to now? More rocket ships to the moon, like?

dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Well, that's definitely part of it. But he just, uh, sold off a huge chunk of Amazon stock. After taxes, he's actually taking home an estimated 2.4 billion dollars.

dialogue_turns.text: Wow, 2.4 *billion*. That's just... [interrupts] an insane amount of money.

dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? And the clear reason, it seems, is that he's investing *heavily*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? And the clear reason, it seems, is that he's investing heavily.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is unclear why Bezos is selling these shares.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so what are these big investments, then? Blue Origin, I'm guessing, for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so what are these big investments, then? Blue Origin, I'm guessing, for sure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! He's been pledging a billion dollars a year, uh, since 2017 to fund Blue Origin, his space company.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! He's been pledging a billion dollars a year, uh, since twenty seventeen to fund Blue Origin, his space company.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2017, the Amazon founder stated at a space conference he would be selling $1 billion worth of shares every year to fund Blue Origin, his space exploration company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A billion every single year? That's, um, some serious commitment to getting off this planet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A billion every single year? That's, um, some serious commitment to getting off this planet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. But then there's also the Bezos Day One Fund. He made a two-billion-dollar pledge for that back in 2018.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. But then there's also the Bezos Day One Fund. He made a two-billion-dollar pledge for that back in twenty eighteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He made a $2 billion pledge in September 2018 for the Bezos Day One Fund, which supports nonprofits focused on providing relief for homeless families as well as building a national network of Montessori-inspired preschools.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I vaguely remember that. That was for, like, homeless shelters and, um, wasn't it also for for-profit preschools?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I vaguely remember that. That was for, like, homeless shelters and, um, wasn't it also for for-profit preschools?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He made a $2 billion pledge in September 2018 for the Bezos Day One Fund, which supports nonprofits focused on providing relief for homeless families as well as building a national network of Montessori-inspired preschools.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's the one. And, like, kind of oddly, since that announcement, he's actually acquired nearly $200 million in assets *from* those same homeless-focused nonprofits.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the one. And, like, kind of oddly, since that announcement, he's actually acquired nearly two hundred million dollars in assets from those same homeless-focused nonprofits.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since the announcement, Bezos has given away nearly $200 million to homeless-focused nonprofits.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, so he pledged money *to* them, but then bought assets *from* them? That sounds... a little strange, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, so he pledged money to them, but then bought assets from them? That sounds... a little strange, doesn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It definitely raises an eyebrow. But he also put ten billion into the Bezos Earth Fund just earlier this year, dedicated to climate change.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It definitely raises an eyebrow. But he also put ten billion into the Bezos Earth Fund just earlier this year, dedicated to climate change.

dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so climate change is a bit more, uh, straightforward, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so climate change is a bit more, uh, straightforward, I guess.

dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And all this, um, big stock selling and money moving, it happened right before he testified before Congress, actually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's the one. So, a lot going on with Mr. Bezos. Oh, and he's actually no longer the richest person in the world, by the way.
